name: Sunset Planet (itch)
description:
Sunset Planet is a small 2D platformer made with Unity for Android and Windows.

Main features

Two playable levels.

Two kinds of collectibles: Gathering Blue ore is found on the ground and extracted from large blue rocks by shooting them. Collect 50 or more Blue ore to complete the game. Red flowers restore Health and when collected at full Health they increase score by 1.

Scoreboard: displays the high score and score of the previous run.

Controls Touch screen buttonsMouse & Keyboard Function Left & Right ArrowsArrow keysMovementArrow UpSpaceJumpMenuEscOpen / Close MenuAAltShootMouseNavigate Menu Install

Windows:

Download the game, unzip it at the desired location, and open Sunset Planet.exe to play.

Android:

Download the .apk and open it to install. Open the app Sunset Planet to play.

System requirements

Windows

Disk space: 150 MB

Android

File size: 44 MB
